resources.string: For the alarm to go off you must:
Walk away from your current location

Alarm Force uses information we collect to operate, maintain and provide you the features and functionality of the application, to analyse how the application is used, diagnose service or technical problems, maintain security, personalise content. You provide us information about the use of the app and not yourself. The information we collect is the time you set your alarms for, if you use; favourites, volume ascending, vibrate, vibrate first options, the clock format, the set distance and, snooze and its duration. Please press Ok to agree and Cancel to disagree
This alarm clock is specifically designed to help you get out of bed in the morning, so there is no off button. The only way to turn the alarm off is to get out of bed.
To change time, swipe up and down on the time in the grey area, or click on it for manual input, and then click the green icon to its right, to set the alarm.
To edit existing alarm click on the pen icon
To edit enable/disable an existing alarm click on the clock icon to the right of the alarm
To add alarm to favourites click on the star and click on the gold star to remove
To access favourite alarms click on the gold star underneath alarm set icon
To change settings click on the icon in the far right corner
You can always return to the home screen by clicking the applications icon
